=======
CHANGES
=======

3.5.0 (2009-02-01)
------------------

- Reduced the dependency upon `zope.app.container` to be simply a
  dependency upon `zope.container`.


3.4.1 (2007-10-31)
------------------

- Resolve ``ZopeSecurityPolicy`` deprecation warning.


3.4.0 (2007-10-23)
------------------

- Initial release independent of the main Zope tree.
